Description.Text:
Property Location
You'll be in Medhufushi (Mulaku Atoll) with a stay at Medhufushi Island Resort.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 112 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private furnished patios. Satellite programming along with DVD players are provided for your entertainment. Partially open bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. After a day at the private beach, you can enjoy other recreational amenities including an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Additional features include wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. After a day at the private beach, you can enjoy other recreational amenities including an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Additional features include wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.
Make yourself at home in one of the 112 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private furnished patios. Satellite programming along with DVD players are provided for your entertainment. Partially open bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

You'll be in Medhufushi (Mulaku Atoll) with a stay at Medhufushi Island Resort.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Meedhuffushi Island Beach - 65.2 km / 40.5 mi
Meedhuffushi Island Pier - 65.3 km / 40.6 mi
Island Port - 70.4 km / 43.7 mi
Dhidhoofinolhu Marina - 101.8 km / 63.2 mi
Rihiveli Beach - 104.9 km / 65.2 mi
Dhangethi Beach - 106.2 km / 66 mi
Villingilivaru Island Pier - 107 km / 66.5 mi
Ranveli beach - 107 km / 66.5 mi
Manta Point - 107.4 km / 66.7 mi
Vakarufalhi Beach - 107.6 km / 66.8 mi
Olhuveli Beach - 108.4 km / 67.4 mi
Maafushivaru Island Beach - 110.1 km / 68.4 mi
Maafushivaru Island Pier - 110.1 km / 68.4 mi
Fihalholi Beach - 113 km / 70.2 mi
Kandooma Beach - 114.1 km / 70.9 mi

The preferred airport for Medhufushi Island Resort is Male (MLE-Male Intl.) - 144.9 km / 90.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Male International Airport (MLE): Approximate journey time to Medhufushi Island Resort is 40 minutes and distance is 130 kilometres (80 miles).

Getting there: The best way to get from the airport to the resort is by sea plane, which takes 40 minutes.

Getting around: The resort is situated on a private island and the only way to leave the island is by boat or sea plane. The island is one kilometre long and 200 metres wide and can be easily explored on foot.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: Sea Planes are forbidden to fly between 1800 hrs -0600 hrs, any guest arriving after 1600hrs will have to stay overnight at Airport hotel or hotel in Male. No show and early departure will be subjected to 100% charge. No date, name and room change allowed. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated. Note: The green tax USD 6 per person per night (including child and infant). Seaplane Transfers are must. You can add for transfer as well mentioning that in order to arrange transfers to contact hotel reservations directly via reservations@southernhospitalityinvestments.com.
